== Main Inclusion Report for br2684ctl ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/b/br2684ctl, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Needed on CD for setting up the network connection for USB ADSL modems which use PPPoE bridged over ATM. It is the    user space utility to control the similarly named kernel module.
 0. ''Security:''
** No security issues in the past
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** A single bug at <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:br2684ctl|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Standard debhelper packaging.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** libatm1, already on the CD.
